CustomField.formula: IF( RecordTypeName__c == 'EB_points', IF( EuroBonus_Points__c < 150001, 'Level 1', IF(EuroBonus_Points__c >= 150001, 'Level 2', Null)),IF (RecordTypeName__c == 'Voucher', IF(Settlement_amount_in_SEK__c < 61500, 'Level 1', IF(Settlement_amount_in_SEK__c >= 61501, 'Level 2',Null)), IF(Settlement_amount_in_SEK__c < 49501, 'Level 1', IF(Settlement_amount_in_SEK__c >= 49501, 'Level 2',Null))))
CustomField.label: Approval Level
